obfuscation: After expenses 7 years at sea I decided to change career also went tto Folk high school tto get an Upper secondary schools competence, and during my year at the Folk high school myself had English at the schedule.

I actually didn't know I was going to become a teacher one year ago, but now I'm here and I haven't got cold feet yet.
